name: Cosmonova
description:
Hello!

For my Game Art class we were asked to create a Diorama representing the vision of a game we would like to make, and this is the result. This project might be updated in the future, with further additions like enemies and an actual level and story w/ mechanics. I should mention that this was made with the intention to be a learning experience, being new to Unity and creating a "game" were great stepping stones to making better projects in the future.

You can move with the character around the scene and take a peek at the art, not much more but hopefully there will be more to do within it like I mentioned before.

Nothing left but to be cheeky and plug something here I guess:

Instagram: ianklaere99

Have fun.
